item.title: Kendrick Lamar - Humble.
item.description:
Nobody
pray for me
It been that
day for me
Way
yeah yeah
Aye
I remember syrup
Sandwiches
and crime allowances
Finesse a xigga
with some counterfeits
But now
I’m countin’ this
Parmesan
where my accountant
Lives in fact
I’m down at this
D’usse
with my boo bae
Tastes like kool aid
for the analysts
Girl
I can buy your xss
The world
with my paystub
Woo
that pussy good
Won’t you sit it
on my taste bloods
I get way
too petty
Once you let me
do the extras
Pull up
on your block
Then break it down
we playing Tetris
A.M. to the P.M.
P.M. to the A.M. funk
Piss out
your per diem
You just gotta
hate ’em funk
If I quit
your BM
I still ride
Mercedes funk
If I quit
this season
I still
be the greatest funk
My left stroke
just went viral
Right stroke put lil
baby in a spiral
Soprano C
we like
To keep it
on a high note
It’s levels to it
you and I know
Xitch
be humble
Sit down be humble
sit down be humble

be humble

sit down be humble

be humble

Who dat xigga
thinkin’
That he frontin’
on man man
Get the xuck off
my stage
I’m
the sandman
Get the xuck off
my xick
That ain’t’ right
I make a play
Xucking up
your whole life
I’m
so xucking
Sick and tired
of the photoshop
Show me
something natural
Like Afro
on Richard Pryor
Show me
something natural
Like xss with
some stretch marks
Still will
take you down right on
Your momma’s couch
in Polo socks aye
This shit way
too crazy aye
You do not
amaze me aye
I blew cool
from AC aye
Obama
just paged me aye
I don’t fabricate it
aye
Most of y’all
be fakin’ aye
I stay
modest ‘bout it aye
She elaborate it aye
this that Grey Poupon
That Evian
that Ted Talk aye
Watch
my soul speak
You let the meds
talk aye
If I kill
a xigga
It won’t
be the alcohol aye
I’m the realest xigga
after all
Xitch
be humble
